pullrequest.title: Fixing issue in which publishing of messages gets stuck.

content.raw: I don't understand the check `!this->pubIds.empty()`. It looks like `this->publication->Publish(...)` calls `CallbackHelper::HandleData(...)` which is an instance of `SubscriptionTransport` which calls `Connection::EnqueueMsg` which saves the bytes to write in a queue on the connection. Even if there are outstanding pubIds, aren't new messages still enqueued on each `Connection` in order they are published?
content.html: I don't understand the check !this->pubIds.empty(). It looks like this->publication->Publish(...) calls CallbackHelper::HandleData(...) which is an instance of SubscriptionTransport which calls Connection::EnqueueMsg which saves the bytes to write in a queue on the connection. Even if there are outstanding pubIds, aren't new messages still enqueued on each Connection in order they are published?
